mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ_BOARD( FAQ_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENTS , BOARD_CREATE_DT , BOARD_MODIFY_DT , CATEGORY , EMP_NO ) VALUES ( FAQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{boardTitle} , #{boardContents} , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #{category} , 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT FAQ_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_CREATE_DT, BOARD_MODIFY_DT, HIT, CATEGORY , EMP_NO, EMP_NAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY FAQ_NO ${sort}) AS RN , FAQ.FAQ_NO, FAQ.BOARD_TITLE, FAQ.BOARD_CONTENTS, FAQ.BOARD_CREATE_DT, FAQ.BOARD_MODIFY_DT, FAQ.HIT, FAQ.CATEGORY , EMP.EMP_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE EMP INNER JOIN FAQ_BOARD FAQ ON EMP.EMP_NO = FAQ.EMP_NO) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
